title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2005/06 to 2006/07, slightly increasing from 2006/07 to 2007/08, roughly constant from 2007/08 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, gradually increasing from 2011/12 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2016/17, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 228.0 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 86.0 was recorded at Year 2005/06
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2005/06 to 2012/13.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2018/19.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012/13 to 2014/15.
